themes: Need for industry infrastructure (publishing reps, booking agents, radio promoters)
Focus on growing the music economy
Critique of individual grants to amateurs
key_phrases: local publishing reps, booking agents, radio promoters etc are needed
Build a music industry that grows the music economy
musicians can make a real living being based in Austin
Individual grants to amateur promoters and aspiring musicians don't grow the pie
Grow the pie and everyone eats
barriers_identified: Lack of industry infrastructure (publishing reps, booking agents, radio promoters)
Fragmented support through individual grants to amateurs
solutions_proposed: Invest in building industry infrastructure (publishing reps, booking agents, radio promoters)
Grow the music economy as a whole rather than focusing on individual grants
